meanings.definition: A person or entity that impounds something.
meanings.sent1: The impounders at the shelter take care of the lost pets.
meanings.sent2: The impounders collected the stray cars parked illegally on the street.
meanings.sent3: The impounders had a race to see who could gather the most items in a day.
meanings.sent4: The impounders were like magnets, attracting all the abandoned items in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The impounders were the guardians of the forgotten belongings, keeping them safe.
